original_text: But Laban said to him, “If I have found favor in your sight, I have learned by divination that the Lord has blessed me because of you.
korean_text: 라반이 그에게 이르되 여호와께서 너로 말미암아 내게 복 주신 줄을 내가 깨달았노니 네가 나를 사랑스럽게 여기거든 그대로 있으라

sentences.original_text: “If I have found favor in your sight,
that the Lord has blessed me because of you.”
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 당신 때문에 나를 복 주셨음이라.”
